author: kaz
msg: Added a note about the known memory issue when the generated checkstyle
report is too large.  Its not an issue with checkstyle, but rather DVSL
or something DVSL uses (such as dom4j).  See my posting about this on
the Velocity mailing list for more information.  The workaround is just
to increase the maximum heap size the JVM uses.
